condition.narrative: LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1 (b). The Borrower, through MoNE, shall carry out, and ensure that the Project is carried out, inaccordance with the terms of this Agreement, and the documents referenced in this Agreement and the ESCP, including the POM.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.2. The Borrower, through MoNE, shall maintain at all times qualified staffing, budgetary resources,and authority necessary and appropriate for the satisfactory implementation of the Project.
LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.3. By no later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, the Borrower, through MoNE, shallassign or hire a procurement specialist for the Project.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.4. By no later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, the Borrower, through MoNE, shallestablish and maintain a DRM-EiE Steering Committee, with a description of its roles and responsibilities, and composition, allacceptable to the Bank.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.B.1. The Borrower, through MoNE, shall by no later than fifteen (15) days after the Effective Date,adopt and maintain throughout the period of Project implementation a Project Operations Manual, in form and substance satisfactoryto the Bank.
LA, Schedule 2, Section I.C.1. The Borrower, through MoNE, shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with theEnvironmental and Social Standards, in a manner acceptable to the Bank.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.C.6. The Borrower, through MoNE, shall ensure that all bidding documents and contracts for civil worksunder the Project include the obligation of contractors, and subcontractors and supervising entities to: (a) comply with therelevant aspects of ESCP and the Environmental and Social Instruments referred to therein; and (b) adopt and enforce codes ofconduct, all as applicable to such civil works commissioned or carried out pursuant to said contracts.

LA, Schedule 2, Section I.D.1(a). The Borrower, through MoNE, shall prepare and furnish to the Bank not later than December 1st ofeach year during the implementation of the Project, a proposed Annual Work Plan and Budget, afford the Bank a reasonableopportunity to exchange views, and ensure that the Project is implemented with due diligence during said following year, inaccordance with such Annual Work Plan and Budget.
